wikipedia_page.main: Gerald Joseph Doyle (born 17 February 1965) is a Scottish former footballer who played for Partick Thistle, Alloa Athletic, Stranraer and Dumbarton.His elder brother Jamie was also a footballer who played for Partick Thistle in the same period, and was later a teammate at Dumbarton.

response: Jerry or Gerry Doyle may also refer to:
* Gerry Doyle (Irish footballer) (1911–1990), Irish footballer and football manager
